meanings.definition: A type of fish with a large head and spiny fins.
meanings.sent1: The gurnard swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen caught a colorful gurnard during their trip.
meanings.sent3: The gurnard tried to hide among the rocks, but its spiny fins gave it away.
meanings.sent4: The gurnard's large head made it stand out among the other fish.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium were fascinated by the gurnard's unique appearance.

meanings.definition: To make a grimace or contorted facial expression.
meanings.sent1: She gurnarded in pain when she stubbed her toe.
meanings.sent2: The actor gurnarded to show his character's frustration.
meanings.sent3: The baby gurnarded at the taste of the new food.
meanings.sent4: He gurnarded at the bad joke his friend told.
meanings.sent5: The student gurnarded during the embarrassing moment in class.
